page.title: 12A FARMER'S DAY
page.content:
{A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A FARMER
{Simon Enderle }lives at Hog's Park Cottage,Chilsworthy, Holsworthy,Devon. He is one of the few farmers who live in our D_block.He is 30 years old and he has a son called{Charles }and a daughter called{Merie}.His hair is greyish brown and his eyes are dark brown. At 7.30 Mr.Enderle gets up and gets dressed,he has a busy day ahead of him.At 7.50 Mr Enderle goes down- stairs to have his breakfast. At 8.00 Mr.Enderle gets his wellies on and walks to the fields to check his bullocks.Mr.Enderle normally gets back to the farm at 11.30,just in time to refuel the tractors. He usually takes an hour to refuel the tractors because it is rather hard going.
